context: High-speed rail from NYC to Boston. Includes WiFi, power outlets, and comfortable seating. Arrives in time for afternoon meetings. Most sustainable option with 92% lower carbon footprint than flying.
Standard Amtrak service with longer travel time but significant cost savings. Includes WiFi and comfortable seating. Early departure allows for full day in Boston.
High-speed rail from Paris to London. 2h20m journey through the Channel Tunnel. Includes WiFi, power outlets, and refreshments. Most sustainable option for European travel.
German high-speed rail connecting Frankfurt to Paris. 4h30m journey with excellent onboard amenities. Includes WiFi, dining car, and spacious seating.
